```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(metathis)
meta() %>%
  meta_description(
    "Vanessa's Blog Posts"
  ) %>%
  meta_name("github-repo" = "vdilego/vdilego.github.io") %>%
  meta_viewport() %>%
  meta_social(
    title = "Vanessa di Lego: Posts",
    url = "https://vdilego.github.io/posts",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = c("di Lego","Vanessa"),
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@v_dilego"
  )
```
